Business & Product: Data Visualization (Power BI, Google Data Studio)

experience.title: Business Analyst
bullets: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather and document business requirements for staffing and payroll automation tools.
Streamlined candidate tracking workflows by introducing Excel-to-database synchronization scripts, reducing manual data entry by 40%.
Supported management with KPI dashboards and labor cost analysis reports, improving visibility and decision-making efficiency.
Partnered with IT to test and validate HR software updates, ensuring data accuracy and compliance with state labor policies.

projects.title: AI Smile Generation Platform
bullets: Developed a full-stack AI image inpainting platform using Flask, Next.js, and Stability AI REST API for natural smile enhancements.
Integrated Firebase Storage for secure upload and retrieval, automating the image pipeline with Python and Google Cloud Run.
Reduced manual dental photo editing by 90% through automated mouth-region detection using MediaPipe and inpainting blending.
Deployed production backend with Docker and CI/CD via Render and later migrated to Cloud Run for scalability.

projects.title: Orange (Provider Credentialing & Compliance Platform)
bullets: Building a HIPAA-compliant credentialing platform for healthcare providers to manage, verify, and share licensure and certification documents.
Integrated CAQH API for automatic provider data imports including NPI, state licenses, DEA, malpractice insurance, and board certifications.
Implemented AI-driven document vault for secure uploads, OCR-based field extraction, and expiration tracking with smart alerts.
Designed a mobile-first interface with quick access and time-limited sharing links for credential packets and compliance files.

projects.title: Pure Labs Catalog (BOM Costing & E-Commerce)
bullets: Built a cosmetic product catalog dashboard in Next.js with dynamic BOM editing and real-time cost breakdown calculators.
Integrated InFlow Inventory API with tiered pricing overrides and internal/external PDF exports.
Added caching and rate-limiting to API requests (60 req/min cap), improving fetch stability and load times by 40%.
Enabled Shopify-copyable marketing templates for non-technical managers to publish updated formulas instantly.

education.degree: Master of Science in Information Technology
